sentences.sentence: Another batch of leaked Pentagon documents suggest that the US may have spied on the head of the United Nations.

sentences.sentence: US President Joe Biden is in Dublin after visiting Northern Ireland for the 25th anniversary of the Good Friday Agreement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The US has announced sanctions for three executives in Hungary on Wednesday due to its support for the Russian-funded international investment bank.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Japan is reeling after North Korea launched an intercontinental missile towards Hokkaido Island.

sentences.sentence: Tokyo says the move is a threat to peace and security.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In Champions League action, Real Madrid beat Chelsea 2-0 while AC Milan secured a 1-0 victory over Napoli at San Siro.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The latest leaked revelations which have sent US officials at the Pentagon into damage control mode involved the United Nations Secretary General.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: United Nations Secretary General. They suggest that the White House believes that Antonio Guterres is too willing to accommodate Russian interests.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The leaked document focuses on the Black Sea grain deal brokered by the UN and Turkey in July amid fears of a global food crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It suggests that Guterres was willing to promote Russia's ability to export, despite involving sanctioned individuals, as long as Ukraine could get its grain out to the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Much of the leaked information in the last few days is concerned the Ukraine war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The classified documents range from briefing slides mapping out Ukrainian military positions to international support for the country. It's feared the leaks could affect Ukraine's plan for a counteroffensive. Розуміють, побачать ті помилки, які були допущені при цьому. З точки зору того, що там було викладено, ну знову ж все ж мене все, це те, що нам, на жаль, дає медіа побачить.

sentences.sentence: Є окремі моменти, але з точки зору демотивації, ну нічого не змінюється.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Все залишилось, як і є, і нам потрібно відвоювати нашу землю.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Pentagon has begun its own internal investigation into the source of the leak, but is playing down concerns it could erode U.S. allies' trust in sharing information in the future.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The rain welcomed Joe Biden to Dublin for a presidential trip full of nostalgia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Upon landing, the U.S. president visited a hangar where he was greeted by U.S.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: embassy officials and their families, many with young children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: After having a brief conversation with them, the U.S. president headed for Collingford Castle. Biden is using the official visit to also soak up the history of his ancestors. Ten of his 16 great-great-grandparents were from Ireland before moving to the United States during the great famine of the 19th century.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The visit will conclude on Friday. Before arriving in Dublin, Biden visited Northern Ireland for the 25th anniversary of the signing of the Good Friday Agreement, which put an end to decades of conflict that killed more than 3,000 people. But recent political turmoil has left Northern Ireland without a functioning government, rattling the foundations of the U.S.-brokered deal.

sentences.sentence: Three executives of the Russian-funded Budapest-based international investment bank have been placed on the U.S. sanctions list.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The announcement was made this Wednesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Two Russian citizens and a former Hungarian ambassador to Kazakhstan and Azerbaijan have also been added to the list.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Since this Russia-controlled entity moved from Moscow to Budapest in 2019, the United States has engaged the Hungarian government on numerous occasions to register our concern about the risks its presence in Hungary poses for the NATO alliance. With this announcement, the United States is demonstrating that we will take action in response to Hungary's choices and to curb the access of Russia and sanctioned Russian persons to the international financial system. According to the US, the International Investment Bank is a front for Russian intelligence services.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The bank's other European owners, such as Slovakia, Romania and Bulgaria, have withdrawn from the project, leaving Hungary as the last European stakeholder.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The latest tension in Washington-Hungarian relations stems from the US Embassy's financial support for a poster campaign drawing parallels between the 1956 Hungarian revolution, which was suppressed by the Soviet Union, and the Ukrainian war.

Officials issued an evacuation order on Thursday after an apparent North Korean ballistic missile heading in the island's direction landed in the Pacific Ocean. While the order was lifted later on Thursday, Japan's cabinet secretary has condemned the launch.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: China is keeping up the pressure on Taiwan despite the formal conclusion of its recent military drills. On Wednesday, Taipei tracked 35 flights by Chinese warplanes within the previous

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Die regionalen Tensionen haben den USA und den Philippinen nicht geholfen, ihre größte jährliche militärische Drill zu halten, die China eine Provokation genannt hat.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Die EU-Powerhouse Deutschland hat mit Anrufen für Karm, die Bejing für die verletzte Situation verurteilt haben.

sentences.sentence: Wir sind sehr besorgt über die Lage in der Straße von Taiwan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Aber der französische Präsident Emmanuel Macron hat auf einer Besuch in den Niederlanden gesagt, dass er nicht in eine verbale Eskalation der Situation in Taiwan beitragen wird. La France est pour le statu quo à Taïwan.

sentences.sentence: La France soutient la politique d'une seule Chine et la recherche d'un règlement pacifique de la situation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.sentence: For example, Ursula von der Leyen spoke of the need to preserve the status quo in the Taiwan Strait.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Real Madrid has secured a 2-0 win over Chelsea in the first leg of the Champions League quarter-finals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: French veteran Karim Benzema netted the first goal, his sixth in five matches against the English side.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Marco Asensio delivered the second goal for Los Blancos in the 74th minute.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Moving to San Siro, AC Milan beat Napoli for the second time in the space of two weeks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: While Luciano Spaglietti's men dominated much of the first half, it was Ismael Benacer who led Real Madrid to a 1-0 victory in the 40th minute. The Rosaneri will play Napoli again on Tuesday as Real Madrid meet Chelsea for the second leg at Stamford Bridge.
